course_name: AI Ethics, Law & Economic Impact Course
description: An intensive program covering AI foundations, ethics, laws, economic impact, industry application, and career pathways.

schedule.title: What is AI? Narrow vs General AI, Generative AI

topics.topic: Theory: What is AI?
Case Study on Narrow vs General AI
Law/Ethical Context: Responsible AI
Hands-On AI Demonstration
